# Create some data!

Here's an r chunk to create the data!

```{r}
x = sort(rnorm(100))
y = sin(x)
summary(x)
summary(y)
```


# Plot it


```{r}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(x=x, y=y, mode='markers', width=800) %>% 
  add_trace(x=x, y=y, mode='line')
```
